pages.text: This track will launch any cart that passes over it into the air. Launch force can be adjusted by right-clicking on the rail with a Crowbar.$(br2)The track must be powered with Redstone to launch carts.

Maybe not very realistic, but a ton of fun anyway!This track will launch any cart that passes over it into the air. Launch force can be adjusted by right-clicking on the rail with a Crowbar.$(br2)The track must be powered with Redstone to launch carts.$(br2)Maybe not very realistic, but a ton of fun anyway!
